thread.title: Kate Winslet Looks Gorgeous, Flaunts Cleavage at 'Steve Jobs' Premiere at NYFF
thread.title_full: Kate Winslet Looks Gorgeous, Flaunts Cleavage at 'Steve Jobs' Premiere at NYFF

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Kate Winslet Looks Gorgeous, Flaunts Cleavage at 'Steve Jobs' Premiere at NYFF
text:
Comments The Oscar-winning actress flaunted her killer cleavage in a black sleeveless mini dress featuring lace and a plunging neckline at the the premiere of 'Steve Jobs' at the New York Film Festival. 
Kate Winslet stole the spotlight at the premiere of " Steve Jobs " at the New York Film Festival on Saturday, October 3. The Oscar-winning actress flaunted her killer cleavage in a dress with plunging neckline. The 40-year-old actress wore a black sleeveless mini dress featuring lace and a plunging neckline which revealed her cleavage. Kate completed her look with a pair of black earrings and heels. She raked her hair back and put red lipstick. Alicia Vikander looked pretty in a long-sleeved wine-colored dress which revealed her shoulders. The 27-year-old actress let her wavy hair loose for the occasion while wearing high heels. Perla Haney-Jardine, meanwhile, looked stunning in a long-sleeved black dress featuring metallic leaves. Sarah Snook who attended the screening looked gorgeous with a little casual touch on her trousers. The Australia-born actress wore a sleeveless sheer black top, flashing her bra. She donned waist-high floral-print trousers and large earrings. Katherine Waterston looked mysterious in dark ensembles. Other celebrities in attendance included cast members Seth Rogen , Michael Fassbender and Michael Stuhlbarg . The biopic recounts the ups and downs Steve had throughout his career which encouraged him to revolutionize the computer, music and mobile industries. The movie is scheduled to be released in the U.S. on October 9.
